alert.note: Alert for Madison (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 02 at 5:15AM CST until January 05 at 1:12PM CST by NWS Huntsville
info.description: ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL 815 AM CST THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Urban area and Small stream flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...A portion of north central Alabama, including the following area, Madison. * WHEN...Until 815 AM CST. * IMPACTS...Flooding of rivers, creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations is imminent or occurring. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 507 AM CST, Gauge reports indicate that heavy rainfall from earlier thunderstorm activity have pushed Indian Creek above flood stage to around 8.6 feet. Minor flooding will continue through the mid morning. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Northwestern Huntsville, Madison, Redstone Arsenal, Triana, Marshall Space Flight Center and Harvest. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Stay away or be swept away. River banks and culverts can become unstable and unsafe.
